## Getting Started
After following the ["Get Started + Install"](https://skenvy.github.io/Collatz/R/articles/collatz.html#install) guide;
```{r setup, message = FALSE}
library(collatz)
# Optionally
library(gmp)
```

## tree_graph
```{r}
tree_graph(5, 3)
tree_graph(16, 3)
```
